chat.msg: hey there, estas listo?
Yes
alrighty then! i'm at the starting point, there's a twig on my left leading to an island with a tiger
which way do i go?
You will follow the twig to the island with the tiger and head west to the far side of the island where another twig will lead you to an island with a parrot and an elephant.
gotcha
I'm at the island with the parrot and the elephant now. where to next, friend?
You will travel north above and over the parrot then travel down around the parrot, between it and the elephant, swinging back towards the east to the Rocks near the frog.
roger that!
Now you will head under the frog and to its rear, making a u-turn back towards the aligator which you will walk over top of.
ok, done! now i'm standing next to the alligator - i can see the sink to my right, what now?
You will walk over the aligator, under the elephant and cross the rocks on the west side bu the giraffe
ok, i got it! i'm next to the giraffe now
which way to go?
After you follow under the giraffe you will cross the twig below and go straight over the snake toards the east to the treasure
alright buddy, i'm at the treasure now! *finished*
hi there, empezamos?
Yes.
awesome! see that wooden bench to your left? walk toward it but don't sit, we're not that tired yet! once you're there, u-turn and head back to our white dog friend we started at
Ok, where to next?
alright, we're going to move south now, just march straight on from our doggy friend
there's another white dog chilling near a picnic mat, give him a friendly wave!
And then?
next, we're gonna cross that picnic mat, be sure to step around the bowl of berries
we don't wanna ruin the snacks, right? after you're done, head west
Ok, will I cross the first log or the second?
we're crossing that first log, friend
just follow it north, like a bridge over tickling water!
Ok, I am looking at a flower cart, where to next
lovely, isn't it? but hang a right around that green bush instead, give it some room, then stroll straight towards that flower stand
Great, now where
hang a left, buddy, and amble under the florist stand
we're making it to that big bridge! see those folks cycling? zip by and keep heading west
Done
great! take a look, see those two older people reading? stroll over but stick to the path between them and the wooden branch
Ok, I am at the branch
perfect
now, take some steps south to the branch's end where a green bush awaits. from there, head east, keep the bush on your right and the branch on your left
Ok. ,I see a deer to the east
ah, there we go! approach our young deer friend
he's the last stop on our journey! you did great!
hey, q tal? empezamos el juego?
Hi! we start at out at our tent and will head south keeping next to the rocks, until we step between the rocks and the dog, looping east to the trail under the dog.
got it, now just between the rocks and the dog, heading east
what's next mate?
From there we will swing north under the dog between it and the fire, going up anf around the fire until we swing back between the fire and the mushroom, heading south the car.
alright, going north under the dog now
good old fido's looking at me funny! now i'm between the fire and the mushroom, heading south to the car. what's next, buddy?

Take a u turn from the car onto the trail unti you can head south on the trail and take it until you reach the telescope. You will cut between the telescope and the bush on the east, hitting the lowest trail on the map.
okay, did a u-turn at the car and now i'm heading south towards the telescope
now i'm between the telescope and the bush. this is fun, where to next pal?
On the trail directly to the south you will head until the trail starts to turn south, but you will head northwest cutting up over the rocks and the log cabin is our goal!
got it! heading west over the rocks now
almost there!
Great! once you get over the rocks you are finished!
*finished* alright, made it over the rocks and there's the cabin! thanks for leading the way, friend! that was fun!
hi there! que comience el juego!!
Lets start!
awesome! you see those three palm trees? move to the first tree on your left, now turn right
cross the second palm tree, and then make a sharp left before you hit the third. head south!
Now I am near the dog
cute, isn't it? just go to its left but maintain your path south
take a slight left then veer back to the right
Ok, we are ujnder the dog, do I go towards the crab?
yup! you're on the ball
move between the big rock on your left and the small one on your right until you hit the water. then, go face that crab!
I am looking at the crab!
great! now turn right and keep following the water's edge along the big rock
keep going west in the water
Ok, I am at the end of the big rock
cool, just keep following the water
you'll pass a medium rock. you'll see a shark, but don't worry! just turn right at the shark
Ok, I am under the ball!
awesome! now, go back to the land and pass between the rock and the ball, then head north
Ok, then where?
veer slightly to the left, and move towards the north-west, you'll pass between a red tent on your left and a loud speaker on your right
Ok, I am above the tent
good job! make a little circle around this tent and then head southwards until you see the sea again
Ok! Now where?
don't go into the water this time
turn right and follow the shore line until you go past a red kayak
Ok, I am just past the kayak
perfect! now turn 90 degrees to your right and walk along the kayak till you see a small green bush
this is our final stop

When you switch languages, how often is it for the following reasons? The word in the other language just fits better.
When you switch languages, how often is it for the following reasons? It's an accident, or I don't realize I'm doing it.
